title: ITT: We turn common household items into insults
body:
bonus points for cringe

"How did you manage to miss that ult? I swear to god this Sejuani is a fucking towel."

OBVIOUS DISCLAIMER: everything here should be stated **in jest**

ᶤ~~ ˢʷᵉᵃʳ ᵗᵒ ᵍᵒᵈ ᶤᶠ ʸᵒᵘ ᵈᵉˡᵉᵗᵉ ᵗʰᶤˢ ᵗʰʳᵉᵃᵈ ʸᵒᵘ ʷᶤˡˡ ᵇᵉ ᶤᶯ ˢᵉʳᶤᵒᵘˢ ᵗʳᵒᵘᵇˡᵉ~~
